entry.title: Check one, check two…. is this thing on?

link.title: Check one, check two.... is this thing on?

entry.content: In order to experiment with the basics of Tensorflow, I installed it and Jupyter on a Digital Ocean box I am not using much . Useful for experimenting with syntax, but only very small scale without GPU or much memory. My aspiration is to experiment with, and perhaps contribute to project Magenta. Looks like I’m going to have to invest in some hardware. Is anyone out there interested in sponsoring some attempt at digital art?

entry.title: Exsqueeze U. ?
entry.content:
Messing around with JUCE, as I’m working on a utility for audio processing. Why are my eyes glazing over? This post will walk through the details of that project as it progresses, and as I get time to document. Until then, I’m staring at the API, and flipping between examples…. zzz guess I need doxygen.


#include "inheritance diagrams.h"

entry.title: Hellooowoh,.. it’s ME.
entry.content:
I was wondering if after all these years you like to meet.

Ok so instead of working, I started this blog. I was inspired by Colah’s blog, but then thought I’d better start with something a little more simple. So I found Jekyll Now and elected to give it a go. Barry’s article in smashing magazine is helpful.

I’ve attempted a few blogs before now, including a wordpress site. Using static pages with jekyll and markdown. This is the easiest by far!

Cool. Now for some content…
entry.summary: I was wondering if after all these years you like to meet.
